scripts.changelog: echo 'generate master changelog' && conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.ci:publish: pnpm build-package && git status && pnpm publish -r --no-git-checks && pnpm changeset tag
scripts.ci:test: cp .env.template .env &&  pnpm build && pnpm with-env turbo run test --no-cache --continue
scripts.ci:version: pnpm changelog && pnpm changeset version && pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && git add .
scripts.deploy:dev: ./check-pm2.sh npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env development
scripts.deploy:local: ./check-pm2.sh npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env local
scripts.deploy:prod: ./check-pm2.sh npm run build && pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --env production
